sent.orig: The word "right"and "write" are spelt differently but they are pronounced the same.
sent.trans: “right”和“write”两字的拼法不同，但发音相同。

sent.orig: It combines four powerful productivity products (File, Write, Report and Assistant) in a single package.
sent.trans: 该系统是把四个功能强的产品(file,Write,Report,Assistant)组合而成的软件包。

sent.orig: My teacher's hands are writing on the blackboard. Write, write, write.
sent.trans: 我的老师的手正在黑板上写字。写字，写字，写字。

sent.orig: Write it on a diary or write it as a blog.
sent.trans: 把它写到日记本或是博客上。

sent.orig: Used to read and write text files and read and write files in binary mode Notes.
sent.trans: 文本文件和二进制文件的区别。用文本方式读写文件和以二进制方式读写文件的注意事项。
